name: Ajay Malik
desc: "Before using Litmaster, I hated poetry especially because I didn't seem to understand any of the abstract ideas and the poetic devices. After I was introduced to Litmaster, I felt like I was truly proficient in English for the first time."

name: Melissa Chen
desc: "Litmaster truly helped me improve my poetry reading skills, and the practice is so creative -it's not like those reading notes with little or no practice exercises. Litmaster is full of prompts and hands-on activitiesthat will help you achieve deep learning."

name: Lana Do
desc: "It's so easy to use Litmaster. I started without knowing anything about poetry or prose. I just work through a lot of drag and drop exercises with really useful tooltips and the next thing I realize is that I am ready for any English test or exam on this planet."
